summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 13th Avenue West and 14th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to West Nickerson Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7267, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
